text: RoboCop 2 is a 1990 American science fiction action movie. It was directed by Irvin Kershner and once again starred Peter Weller, Nancy Allen and Dan O'Herlihy.M. Keith Booker, Alternate Americas: Science Fiction Film and American Culture (Westport, CT: Praeger, 2006). It is a sequel to the 1987 movie RoboCop. The movie is set in the near future in a crime-ridden dystopian Detroit, Michigan. A sequel to this movie, RoboCop 3, was released in 1993. A remake of the 1987 movie was released in February 2014. ==References== Category:1990 crime movies Category:1990 action movies Category:1990 science fiction movies Category:American action movies Category:American crime movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about police officers Category:Movies about businesspeople Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies set in Detroit Category:Movies set in the future Category:RoboCop Category:Drone movies Category:Dystopian movies Category:American superhero movies Category:American independent movies
title: RoboCop 2
